---
openapi: get /assessment/api/fetch_interviews/v2/
---

# Fetch and Group Assessments (V2)

This API allows you to fetch assessments from both the Self-Assessment and Smartcheck modules. It provides powerful filtering capabilities and groups the results based on a combination of identifiers, making it easy to retrieve all assessments related to a specific interaction or entity.

The grouping is based on a composite key of `practitioner_uuid`, `patient_uuid`, `unique_identifier`, and `transaction_id`.

## Example Request

<APIEndpoint
  method="GET"
  path="/assessment/api/fetch_interviews/v2/"
  description="Fetch assessments for patients or doctors based on filters like status, workflow IDs and identifiers"
/>

Here is an example of how to fetch all completed assessments for a specific patient.

```bash
curl --location 'http://deepthought.eka.care/assessment/api/fetch_interviews/v2/?status=COMPLETED&unique_identifier=173765761279832' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'jwt-payload: {"b-id":174299061865934,"iss":"emr.eka.care", "uuid":"40d6c891-4a30-400e-a861-7fdb9b06606a"}' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..DYLDmKHqt11_fol2MFjMuOpDJqhac1K_2w0rhP1X3LI'
